name: Dullland
description:
This is a shortened version of the game. It's supposed to have 12 levels, not 5 but time, so...

You are a regular kid (but you skip school), then you save the Places by returning creativity to the world.

####CONTROLS: 

WASD= move and interact; 

J="B"; 

I="A"; 

V="Select"; 

B="Start" 

(a little unconventional, but very GameBoy.)

[Update:] Just finished the demo version. I'll make the FULL version in another indiepocalypse jam if people like it.
